verbose_text: To test whether the presence of LiCl or Fz-8/Fc could worsen or reverse the effect of WIF1 on the expression of the hypertrophic markers, as has been observed in vivo, the cells (stable H9c2 cell line overexpressing WIF1) were treated with LiCl or Fz-8/Fc, and the expression of beta-catenin, c-myc, nppb and actalpha1 were determined.
